'''Kim Thomson''' (born [[1960]] in [[London]]), is an [[England|English]] [[actor|actress]] who has worked since the mid 1980s in British [[regional theatre]] and [[West End theatre]], and on television and films produced on both sides of the [[Atlantic Ocean|Atlantic]].
